name: q38
description:
Is the problem ongoing or has it been resolved? By "resolved," I mean that there has been a resolution, sentence, or agreement. For example, the problem of an overdue debt would be "resolved" if a judge issued a resolution or sentence, or if an agreement had been reached with the other party. 

The resolution is independent of whether the problem is solved or not. For example, even after a judge's setence or an agreement, an overdue debt could have been paid or not.

name: q40f
description:
Is the problem ongoing or has it been resolved?

By “resolved,” I mean that there has been a resolution, sentence, or agreement. For example, the problem of an overdue debt would be “resolved” if a judge issued a resolution or sentence, or if an agreement had been reached with the other party. The resolution is independent of whether the problem is solved or not. For example, even after a judge’s sentence or an agreement, an overdue debt could have been paid or not.
values:
1=Ongoing (GO TO q47)
2=Too early to say (GO TO q47)
3=Done with, but problem persists
